vclaim: The California Ethnic Studies Model Curriculum (ESMC), which was adopted as a voluntary curriculum in the state in March 2021, calls for a “countergenocide” against white Christians and makes students honor Aztec gods of human sacrifice in their chants.
title: Does Calif. Ethnic Studies Curriculum Call for Chants to Aztec Gods, ‘Countergenocide’ Against White Christians?
subtitle: Though adoption by schools is voluntary, the California Ethnic Studies Model Curriculum has generated intense controversy in the state.
author: Nur Ibrahim
